body: I realize there is a lot of documentation in nn_ops.cc to which this comment refers. However, could you add comments here that explains how this OpKernel differs from those in 'nn_ops.cc' (it uses mkl library, it changes layout, etc). It would be good to have a high-level description at the top on this file (as well as backprop input).
